title: VCBC issues w/T207 survey - free to a good home .... DONE

posts.post_title: VCBC issues w/T207 survey - free to a good home .... DONE
posts.post_content:
[STRIKE][/STRIKE]I'll even cover shipping, if you can tell me who authored the articles on T207 in the two issues ... :-)

Offer stands until Sat, 5 June, EDT...

Love the issues, but they'll not be making the move with us.

--
Mike (mikefrohme@yahoo.com)

Yessir, Issac.

Thank you!  (and Tim and Bob might thank you separately, if they happened to read this and were so inclined)
--
Mike

someone remembers them :)

Doing that was so much fun - put me in touch with a lot of great collectors.
